createEnlargedHTMLView

public void createEnlargedHTMLView()
Creates an enlarged view of the rule's html description. This method is called by the listener to the enlarge button (AllPanelListener).

getInnerPanelSize

public java.awt.Dimension getInnerPanelSize()
Gets the size of the inner raised panel so that it can be copied by other panels.

Returns:
The size of the panel, or a size of 0 if the panel doesn't yet exist.

getPermissableRules

public java.lang.String[] getPermissableRules(java.lang.String currentLattice)
Only some rules will work with a given lattice.

Parameters:
currentLattice - The currently selected lattice. May be null if unknown.
Returns:
A list of rules that work with the current lattice.

getRuleTree

public RuleTree getRuleTree()
Gets the wrapper class for the rule tree menu (for choosing the current CA rule).

Returns:
The wrapper class for the tree used to select the current rule.
